text: Hi, just a quick question: Do we use WGLMakie or Makie for Pluto.jl notebooks

elements.text: Hi, just a quick question: Do we use WGLMakie or Makie for Pluto.jl notebooks

text: I’ve been using CairoMakie without problems. You don’t get interactivity though.
